sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , SUB1.LIC_GRP_ID , SUB1.PRJ_GRP_ID , SUB1.PRJ_ID , SUB1.PRJ_NM , SUB1.JEN_ID , SUB1.JEN_NM , SUB1.JEN_URL , SUB1.JEN_USR_ID , SUB1.JEN_USR_NM , SUB1.JEN_DESC , SUB1.JOB_ID , SUB1.JOB_TYPE_CD , SUB1.JOB_TYPE_NM , SUB1.JOB_RESTORE_ID , SUB1.JOB_PARAMETER , SUB1.JOB_DESC , SUB1.USE_CD , SUB1.USE_NM , SUB1.REG_DTM , SUB1.REG_USR_ID , SUB1.REG_USR_IP , SUB1.MODIFY_DTM , SUB1.MODIFY_USR_ID , SUB1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , (SELECT PRJ_NM FROM PRJ1000 X WHERE X.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND X.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM , A.JEN_ID , C.JEN_NM , C.JEN_URL , C.JEN_USR_ID , (SELECT USR_NM FROM STM3000 X WHERE X.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND X.USR_ID = C.JEN_USR_ID) AS JEN_USR_NM , C.JEN_DESC , B.JOB_ID , B.JOB_TYPE_CD , (SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM STM4001 X WHERE X.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND X.MST_CD = 'DPL00002' AND X.SUB_CD = B.JOB_TYPE_CD) AS JOB_TYPE_NM , B.JOB_RESTORE_ID , B.JOB_PARAMETER , B.JOB_DESC , B.USE_CD , (SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM STM4001 X WHERE X.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND X.MST_CD = 'CMM00001' AND X.SUB_CD = B.USE_CD) AS USE_NM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM STM9002 A LEFT JOIN STM9001 B ON (A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID AND A.JOB_ID = B.JOB_ID) LEFT JOIN STM9000 C ON (B.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND B.JEN_ID = C.JEN_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND C.DEL_CD = '02' AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) SUB1 WHERE 1=1
AND SUB1.PRJ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_URL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_DESC LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_USR_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_RESTORE_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_DESC LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUB1.USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
ASC
DESC
ORDER BY PRJ_NM ASC, JOB_ID ASC

SELECT ROWNUM RN , SUB1.LIC_GRP_ID , SUB1.JEN_ID , SUB1.JEN_NM , SUB1.JEN_USR_ID , SUB1.JEN_USR_NM , SUB1.JEN_USR_TOK , SUB1.JEN_URL , SUB1.JOB_ID , SUB1.JOB_RESTORE_ID , SUB1.JOB_TOK , SUB1.JOB_TYPE_CD , SUB1.JOB_TYPE_NM , SUB1.JOB_PARAMETER , SUB1.JOB_DESC , SUB1.USE_CD , SUB1.USE_NM , SUB1.REG_DTM , SUB1.REG_USR_ID , SUB1.REG_USR_IP , SUB1.MODIFY_DTM , SUB1.MODIFY_USR_ID , SUB1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.JEN_ID , B.JEN_NM , B.JEN_USR_ID , (SELECT USR_NM FROM STM3000 X WHERE X.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND X.USR_ID = B.JEN_USR_ID) AS JEN_USR_NM , B.JEN_USR_TOK , B.JEN_URL , A.JOB_ID , A.JOB_RESTORE_ID , A.JOB_TOK , A.JOB_TYPE_CD , (SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM STM4001 X WHERE X.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND X.MST_CD = 'DPL00002' AND X.SUB_CD = A.JOB_TYPE_CD) AS JOB_TYPE_NM , A.JOB_PARAMETER , A.JOB_DESC , A.USE_CD , (SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM STM4001 X WHERE X.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND X.MST_CD = 'CMM00001' AND X.SUB_CD = A.USE_CD) AS USE_NM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM STM9001 A LEFT JOIN STM9000 B ON(A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND B.DEL_CD = '02' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT X.JOB_ID FROM STM9002 X WHERE 1 = 1 AND X.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND X.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND X.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND X.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID AND X.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID ) ) SUB1 WHERE 1=1
AND SUB1.JEN_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_URL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_DESC LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_USR_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_RESTORE_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_DESC LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUB1.USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
ASC
DESC
ORDER BY SUB1.REG_DTM DESC, SUB1.JOB_ID ASC

SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , SUB2.AUTH_TYPE_CD , SUB2.AUTH_TYPE_NM , SUB2.LIC_GRP_ID , SUB2.PRJ_ID , SUB2.JEN_ID , SUB2.JOB_ID , SUB2.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID , SUB2.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_NM , SUB2.EMAIL , SUB2.TELNO , SUB2.USR_IMG_ID , SUB2.DEPT_ID , SUB2.DEPT_NAME , SUB2.USR_POSITION_CD , NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00007', SUB2.USR_POSITION_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_POSITION_NM , SUB2.USR_DUTY_CD , NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00008', SUB2.USR_DUTY_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_DUTY_NM FROM ( SELECT SUB1.* , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00007', SUB1.AUTH_TYPE_CD, '1') AS AUTH_TYPE_NM FROM ( SELECT '01' AS AUTH_TYPE_CD , B.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID , A.DPL_AUTH_TYPE_CD , B.USR_NM AS DPL_AUTH_TARGET_NM , B.EMAIL , B.TELNO , B.USR_IMG_ID , B.DEPT_ID , SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, B.DEPT_ID, '2') AS DEPT_NAME , B.USR_POSITION_CD , B.USR_DUTY_CD FROM STM9003 A INNER JOIN STM3000 B ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.USR_ID = A.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.DEL_CD = '02' AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND B.BLOCK = '01' AND A.DPL_AUTH_TYPE_CD = '01' AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# UNION SELECT '02' AS AUTH_TYPE_CD , B.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID , A.DPL_AUTH_TYPE_CD , B.AUTH_GRP_NM AS DPL_AUTH_TARGET_NM , '' AS EMAIL , '' AS TELNO , '' AS USR_IMG_ID , '' AS DEPT_ID , '' AS DEPT_NM , '' AS USR_POSITION_CD , '' AS USR_DUTY_CD FROM STM9003 A INNER JOIN PRJ2000 B ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND B.AUTH_GRP_ID = A.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01') WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_AUTH_TYPE_CD = '02' AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# ) SUB1 WHERE 1=1
AND SUB1.DPL_AUTH_TYPE_CD = #dplAuthTypeCd#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY DECODE(SUB1.AUTH_TYPE_CD, '02', 1, '01', 2), SUB1.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_NM, SUB1.USR_POSITION_CD DESC, SUB1.USR_DUTY_CD DESC
) SUB2 WHERE 1=1
AND SUB2.AUTH_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUB2.USR_POSITION_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUB2.USR_DUTY_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUB2.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB2.AUTH_TYPE_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB2.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'

SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , SUB2.AUTH_TYPE_CD , SUB2.AUTH_TYPE_NM , SUB2.LIC_GRP_ID , SUB2.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID , SUB2.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_NM , SUB2.EMAIL , SUB2.TELNO , SUB2.USR_IMG_ID , SUB2.DEPT_ID , SUB2.DEPT_NAME , SUB2.USR_POSITION_CD , NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00007', SUB2.USR_POSITION_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_POSITION_NM , SUB2.USR_DUTY_CD , NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00008', SUB2.USR_DUTY_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_DUTY_NM FROM ( SELECT SUB1.* , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00007', SUB1.AUTH_TYPE_CD, '1') AS AUTH_TYPE_NM FROM ( SELECT '01' AS AUTH_TYPE_CD , A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.USR_ID AS DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID , A.USR_NM AS DPL_AUTH_TARGET_NM , A.EMAIL , A.TELNO , A.USR_IMG_ID , a.DEPT_ID , SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, A.DEPT_ID, '2') AS DEPT_NAME , A.USR_POSITION_CD , A.USR_DUTY_CD FROM STM3000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.DEL_CD = '02' AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND A.BLOCK = '01' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT Z.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID FROM STM9003 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.DPL_AUTH_TYPE_CD = '01' AND Z.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID = A.USR_ID AND Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Z.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND Z.JOB_ID = #jobId# ) UNION SELECT '02' AS AUTH_TYPE_CD , A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_ID AS DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_NM AS DPL_AUTH_TARGET_NM , '' AS EMAIL , '' AS TELNO , '' AS USR_IMG_ID , '' AS DEPT_ID , '' AS DEPT_NM , '' AS USR_POSITION_CD , '' AS USR_DUTY_CD FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT Z.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID FROM STM9003 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.DPL_AUTH_TYPE_CD = '02' AND Z.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID = A.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND Z.JOB_ID = #jobId# ) ) SUB1 WHERE 1=1
AND SUB1.DPL_AUTH_TYPE_CD = #dplAuthTypeCd#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY DECODE(SUB1.AUTH_TYPE_CD, '02', 1, '01', 2), SUB1.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_NM
) SUB2 WHERE 1=1
AND SUB2.AUTH_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUB2.USR_POSITION_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUB2.USR_DUTY_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUB2.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB2.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB2.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (
) A
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO STM9002 ( LIC_GRP_ID, PRJ_GRP_ID, PRJ_ID, JEN_ID, JOB_ID , REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #prjGrpId#, #prjId#, #jenId#, #jobId# , SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM STM9002 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (
) Z

SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (
) Z
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO STM9003 ( LIC_GRP_ID, PRJ_ID, JEN_ID , JOB_ID, DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID, DPL_AUTH_TYPE_CD , REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #prjId#, #jenId# , #jobId#, #dplAuthTargetId#, #dplAuthTypeCd# , SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM STM9003 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId#
AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_AUTH_TARGET_ID = #dplAuthTargetId# AND A.DPL_AUTH_TYPE_CD = #dplAuthTypeCd#
